com.cognifide.slice.mapper.annotation

Annotation Type Children


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=FIELD)
public @interface Children
    Allows mapper to map all child resources of a parent resource into array, List, Set, SortedSet or Collection. When mapping to SortedSet child model must implement the Comparable interface.
    The parent resource is the one indicated by the name of the field or JcrProperty. If the child resource doesn't exist, then the collection will be empty, but never null. 
     
 {@literal @}SliceResource
 public class ExampleModel {

   {@literal @}Children(LinkModel.class)
   {@literal @}JcrProperty
   private List<LinkModel> links;

 }
    Author:
    Kamil Ciecierski

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      Class<?> value 

    • Element Detail

      • value

        public abstract Class<?> value
        Returns:
        Expected type of models which all child resources will be mapped to. It must be the same as used in generic type of the collection, or component type for arrays.
